rows.title: Bluesky Social
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: Access your Bluesky social profile, read your timeline, make posts, leave likes, and more.

rows.title: Stagehand
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: An AI-powered browser automation framework for xyOps.  Drive a headless browser with simple English instructions, take actions, extract data, capture network requests, and even record a video of the whole session.

rows.title: AI Generation
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: An AI plugin which lets you prompt any AI provider and LLM, including local models, and return the result.

rows.title: Extract Anything
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: Extract structured data out of any file, using the amazing Kreuzberg library.

rows.title: Weather Forecast
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: Fetch current conditions and forecasts from the free Open-Meteo API.

rows.title: Replicate AI
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: Generate high-quality AI images, video, or audio using the Replicate API.

rows.title: On Holiday
rows.author: UNICodehORN
rows.description: Skip or execute xyOps schedules on public holidays using OpenHolidaysAPI.

rows.title: Sun Trigger
rows.author: UNICodehORN
rows.description: Execute xyOps schedules based on sun using public sunset API.

rows.title: PowerShell Plugin
rows.author: Nick Dollimount
rows.description: Execute PowerShell script code using xyOps events.

rows.title: MSSQL Query
rows.author: Tim Alderweireldt
rows.description: Execute SQL queries against Microsoft SQL Server databases using PowerShell and dbatools. Supports encrypted connections, certificate validation, CSV/JSON export, and automatic row limiting.

rows.title: MSSQL Information
rows.author: Tim Alderweireldt
rows.description: Collect comprehensive information from Microsoft SQL Server instances including server details, Availability Groups, database inventory, and user accounts. Outputs multiple tables and structured JSON for workflows.

rows.title: VMware VM Operations
rows.author: Tim Alderweireldt
rows.description: Perform operations on VMware virtual machines such as powering on/off, taking snapshots, and retrieving VM information.

rows.title: MSSQL Health Check
rows.author: Tim Alderweireldt
rows.description: Perform comprehensive health checks on Microsoft SQL Server instances.

rows.title: File Export
rows.author: Tim Alderweireldt
rows.description: A versatile xyOps Action Plugin that exports job output data to multiple file formats including JSON, CSV, HTML, XML, Markdown, YAML, Plain Text, Excel, PDF, and HL7 healthcare formats and with powerful data transformation capabilities
